name: Giant Lizard
description: A large, cold-blooded reptile covered in tough scales, with a long muscular body and a powerful tail.
memorable: The Giant Lizard's ability to detach its tail provides a strategic escape while reducing damage.
goals: Survive and defend itself; often domesticated or used as mounts.
relations: Lizardfolk keep them as pets; used by drow and duergar as mounts.
strengths: Excellent climbers, capable of inflicting moderate damage with their bite, durable for their challenge rating.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit complexity in thought and strategic planning.
attacks: Bite attack with good accuracy, inflicting piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Detach Tail allows it to evade damage and retreat during combat.
senses: Has darkvision up to 30 feet, allowing it to see in dim light.
skills: Possesses a Stealth skill score of 13, making it capable of ambush tactics.
additional_information: Can be ridden or used as a draft animal.
Good endurance and capable of traversing difficult terrain.
Moderate armor class and hit points for lower-level encounters.
Predictable in combat due to low strategic thinking.
test_queries: large reptile found in jungles and deserts
giant beast with a detachable tail
muscular lizard with a strong bite
